description:
I found this app when I started using Fedora 29, however on 31 its broken for me. 
Try and adjust the size or the transparency and it crashes.  

Event the retrace bug reporter crashes.  

Perhaps its just a thing that has changed per the newest OS. How knows
summary: Default selection works, everything else is a Crash

description: More like rainmeter alternative but i cant install it..
summary: I want to try it, But it doesn't work on Ubuntu 20.04 (GNOME 3.36.2)

description: I installed Conky manager and it also installed Conky. The selection was limited and source library outdated. When trying to uninstall it, Conky Manager uninstalled, but it left basic Conky on my machine. It kept popping up and I couldn't close it without reinstalling CM manager again. Frustrating and don't recommend this application at all.
summary: I wish I didn't install it

description:
hace un rato instale en debian 11 pero no puedo hacer que se ejecuten los monitores... ni de fecha y hora, ni de procesador, ni de red... 
por eso mi puntuacion, esta muy bueno pero lamento que no este andando al100%
malo no me funciona, uso debian 11
Не признаю линукс без коньков, это как визитная карточка, что касается приложения , оно на 5 сделано. Но только есть проблемы в манджаро кде, там чето намудрили, поэтому я теперь на гарудо кде)))
